entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @bbcnickrobinson @DavidGauke Not that simple...the people who voted for Brexit will most likely have voted Johnson and his Govt into power.Johnson and his Govt who failed to act with any urgency over Covid19...were negligent...hence we are in this dreadful place right now.... so no I will not give it a rest.
